Identification.LongTitle: United Nations Headquarters Medal for Special Service Order (New York City)

Provision.Text: His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby

Provision.Label: (a)
Provision.Text: authorizes the officers and non-commissioned members of the Canadian Armed Forces to accept and wear the United Nations Headquarters Medal in recognition of honourable service at United Nations Headquarters in New York City for a period of at least 90 days; and

Provision.Label: (b)
Provision.Text: directs that the United Nations Headquarters Medal follow the United Nations Special Service Medal and precede the International Commission and Organization Medals in the order of precedence in the Canadian Honours Systems.
